difficultyList.Name: Ironman Mode
difficultyList.Tooltip: Ironman Mode restricts you to only one save file. All consequences, including 'Mech loss, MechWarrior death, and failed missions are permanent. Running out of funds or failing any Priority Mission will result in campaign loss. This setting is intended for veterans and those seeking a significant challenge.

difficultyList.Name: Parts for 'Mech Assembly
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the number of salvaged or purchased 'Mech parts you must acquire to assemble a new 'Mech. Increase this value to make new 'Mechs rarer and more difficult to obtain. <color=#00e600>Save and reload to change during Play</color>

difficultyList.Name: 'Mech Recovery Chance
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting defines chance to recover a destroyed 'Mech before KIA(+10%) and EJECT(+50%) recovery bonus. <color=#F79B26>defines the chance of getting your oen mech back for free</color>

difficultyList.Name: Enemy Force Strength
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting changes enemy lance strength by roughly 1 half skull per difficulty setting.

difficultyList.Name: Contract Difficulty Variance
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your Choice of Maximum difficulty difference between generated contracts<color=#F79B26>Each number is a half skull difference to your global difficulty.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Contract Payment
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the amount of C-Bills paid by contracts across the entire game. Adjust this setting to make the economic gameplay more or less forgiving.

difficultyList.Name: Salvage
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting changes the amount of salvage you may obtain from negotiation. Adjust this setting to make the economic gameplay more or less forgiving.

difficultyList.Name: Commander Experience Points
difficultyList.Tooltip: Use this to decide for the starting Experience of your Commander

difficultyList.Name: Advanced MechWarriors
difficultyList.Tooltip: In the later parts of the game, new MechWarriors in the Hiring Hall will often have better stats and skills than in the early parts of the game. Modify this setting to change the frequency of new MechWarriors having these improvements.

difficultyList.Name: Ronin Hire Chance
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the chance of hiring ronin

difficultyList.Name: Pilots per system
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the Pilots avaible per System

difficultyList.Name: MechWarrior Progression
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the amount of experience MechWarriors gain after each mission. Change this setting to adjust the rate at which MechWarriors improve their stats and gain new skills.

difficultyList.Name: MechWarrior Exponent
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the exponent of raising XP Cost per Level. <color=#F79B26>LevelCost=(Potential Level,Exponent)*Multiplier.</color>

difficultyList.Name: MechWarrior Multiplier
difficultyList.Tooltip: This setting controls the multiplier of XP Cost per Level. <color=#F79B26>LevelCost=(Potential Level,Exponent)*Multiplier.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Lethality
difficultyList.Tooltip: Choose the chance of being KILLED IN ACTION from never to always.

difficultyList.Name: Starting Money
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select your starting capital. <color=#F79B26>1% Cost of your starting Lance will be deducted from this.</color>

difficultyList.Name: Mech Bay Speed
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select Mech Bay construction Speeds

difficultyList.Name: Mech Bay Armour Speed
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select the speed at which your armour is changed

difficultyList.Name: Mech Bay CBILLS
difficultyList.Tooltip: Select Mech Bay Cbill Cost

difficultyList.Name: Shop Selling Prices
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your desired Selling Values.

difficultyList.Name: Scrap Return Values
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your desired Scrapping Payouts.

difficultyList.Name: Max Shop Inventory
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your desired Max Shop Inventory.

difficultyList.Name: Max Specials per shop
difficultyList.Tooltip: Set your desired Max Special Amount .

difficultyList.Name: Starting Planet
difficultyList.Tooltip: This Setting decides at which Planet and what 'Mech you start defined by Faction.
